SELECT C.NO , MEM.NICK AS TEACHER_NO ,CATE.NAME as CATEGORY ,C.CLASS_NAME ,C.CLASS_CONTENT ,C.RECOMM ,C.STUDENT_CNT ,C.PRICE ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,C.MODIFY_DATE ,C.DELETE_YN ,C.CLASS_CNT , (SELECT count(*) FROM REVIEW_LEC REV WHERE REV.CLASS_NO = C.NO ) as REVIEW_CNT , (Select TRUNC(avg(rev.score), 2) from review_lec rev where rev.class_no = c.no) as REV_AVG FROM CLASS C JOIN CLASS_CATE CATE ON C.CATEGORY = CATE.NO
